name: frame(minWidth:idealWidth:maxWidth:minHeight:idealHeight:maxHeight:alignment:)
desc: Positions this view within an invisible frame having the specified size constraints.
declaration: func frame(minWidth: CGFloat? = nil, idealWidth: CGFloat? = nil, maxWidth: CGFloat? = nil, minHeight: CGFloat? = nil, idealHeight: CGFloat? = nil, maxHeight: CGFloat? = nil, alignment: Alignment = .center) -> some View
